data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ 0 d,
rw hd,
refl

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with x hd,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with n hp,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hp,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with n hp,
rw zero_add,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw succ_add,
rw hp,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_assoc a c b,
rw add_comm c,
rw add_assoc a b c,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with x hp,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_zero,
rw hp,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
induction m with n hp,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hp,
rw succ_eq_add_one,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with n hi,
rw mul_zero,
repeat {rw add_zero},

rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hi,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with n hi,
repeat {rw mul_zero},
rw mul_succ,
rw hi,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with n hi,
repeat {rw mul_zero},
rw add_zero,
refl,

rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw succ_eq_add_one n,
rw mul_add,
rw hi,
rw mul_one,
rw add_assoc (a * n) n (succ a),
rw add_succ,
rw add_comm n a,
rw add_succ (a * n) (a + n),
rw add_assoc (a * n) a n,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction b with n hi,
rw zero_mul,
repeat {rw add_zero},

rw add_succ,
rw succ_mul,
rw hi,
rw succ_mul,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with n hi,
rw zero_mul,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

rw mul_succ,
rw succ_mul,
rw hi,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
rw mul_comm a (b * c),
rw mul_comm a c,
rw mul_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=

lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
example : mynat → mynat :=

example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h p,
have t : T := j q,
have u : U := l t,
exact u,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h p,
have t : T := j q,
have u : U := l t,
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pqr,
intro pq,
intro p,
apply pqr,
exact p,
apply pq,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
intro qf, 
intro p,
apply qf,
apply pq,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
apply h,
apply f,
exact p,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact a,

(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)

have t := j q,
have u := l t,
exact u,

data.editorText:

apply hqr,
apply hpq,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
repeat {rw not_iff_imp_false},
intros hpq hqf p,
apply hqf,
apply hpq,
exact p,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)

(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=

lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
split,
exact q,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intros hpq hqr,
cases hpq with p q,
cases hqr with q' r,
split,
exact p,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intros hiffpq hiffqr,
cases hiffpq with hpq hqp,
cases hiffqr with hqr hrq,
split,
intro p,
apply hqr,
apply hpq,
exact p,
intro r,
apply hqp,
apply hrq,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=

cases hiffqr with hqr hrq,
split,

intro r,

apply hrq,
exact r,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro hpoq,
cases hpoq with p q,
right,
exact p,
left,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,

intro hpqr,
cases hpqr with p hqr,
cases hqr with q r,

left,
split,
exact p,
exact q,

right,
split,
exact p,
exact r,

intro hpqpr,
cases hpqpr with hpq hpr,

cases hpq with p q,
split,

exact p,

left,
exact q,

cases hpr with p r,
split,

exact p,

right,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
intro hpnp,
cases hpnp with p np,
exfalso,
apply np,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
by_cases p : P; by_cases q : Q,
repeat {cc},

data.lean: theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
apply succ_inj,
apply succ_inj,
exact h,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h1,
apply succ_inj,
exact h1,
intro h2,
rw h2,
refl,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
induction t with n hn,
repeat {rw add_zero at h},
exact h,
repeat {rw add_succ at h},
have hab := succ_inj(h),
apply hn,
exact hab,

data.lean: theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=

theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=

theorem add_le_add_left {a b : mynat} (h : a ≤ b) (t : mynat) :
  t + a ≤ t + b :=
lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=
lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=
lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
